channel.title: New Dicing Community!
channel.description:
Ever wanted to be part of a new dicing society? Now you can! [b]BRAND NEW[/b] dicing FC -- mistapnut
Any [b]RANKED[/b] hosts are 100% legit, verified by myself, any other host is a [b]RISK[/b] to you, [b]BUT[/b] if anyone is ever scammed in my FC, I will personally double the pot to the better, and ban the hoster for life.
We are hoping to grow and become a [b]LARGE[/b] society.
[b][mistapnut][/b]
[b][u]RECUIREMENTS[/u][/b] Enough cash to host (You're opinion on amount) A positive attitude
[b][u]RULES[/u][/b] No scamming! --EVER No lying! --EVER No re-rolling! --EVER Have fun. :)
------------------------------------------------- Join "[b]mistapnut[/b]" friend channel on Runescape for all your dicing needs!

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I get that rep is pointless. I’ve helped tons of people and I’m not crying about rep. But, I think it’s time to let this topic die.

Read full topic

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:27, topic:413448”][quote author=mista pnut link=topic=514948.msg3742804#msg3742804 date=1315515854]
Reyx7, why do you assume everyone is what you call at “Newfag”?

I mean, just because I don’t have rep doesn’t mean I’m new at all. I’m not saying I’m an old member of the community, but I’ve been here several months.

Date Registered: February 01, 2011, 05:48:25 PM
[/quote]

I say newfag to new and confused people.
And the only people who think Rep is important is those who want it. You’ll find Rep doesn’t represent a persons skill at all.[/quote]

Exactly, I honestly can say Idgaf about rep.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“RuneScapeeer279, post:24, topic:413448”][quote author=StubernSnake link=topic=514948.msg3741952#msg3741952 date=1315438243]
IF jagex was smart they would make a dozen maxed mains etc… and sell em on a site like gold4rs…
[/quote]What exactly does this have to do with the topic?[/quote]
Newfag wants rep. Just report the post and move on.
Look, OP, you’re new here, no one can trust you yet. This won’t spread at all.

item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:21, topic:413448”][quote author=mista pnut link=topic=514948.msg3739700#msg3739700 date=1315252316]

Nobody will pay for anything. I will be giving ranks on more of a trust system.

Note: I find it funny I was de-repped for this and told I was an “ignorant idiot”. LOL
[/quote]
i’d happily host in your CC. only have around 30m thoughs. ;s[/quote]

Join, I’m about to get on.

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

DO what sm_dcing does…Its a 50m+ plus deposit held for scams, every ten mil deposited is another one mil max they can host, ( 50m deposit means 5mil max wager but 10mil pot and 60mil deposit means 6mil max host and 12mil pot) ect.

Funny fact: smd=sm dicing =o

Read full topic

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

How about instead of allowing people to buy ranks, you use an actual trusted promotion system! If you still want that extra guarantee, you can tell them when you’re going to promote them (“I need XXXX for a guarantee, you can have it back after a certain amount of time once you’ve proven your trust” or whatever.) If you’re just taking money and not ever giving it back or anything, I honestly think you’re just in it for the money

Read full topic

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

Dragon dyce charged for a reason as I recall, if A hoster runs off with cash they can give the funds back to the players. I don’t know if its a problem anymore but back when Dicing first started to make headway and dragon dyce was young we had a hoster run off with a 50m bet, they promptly returned the money to each of us and banned the hoster.

I do the same. That’s part of the reason that ranks need to be paid for. Say they pay for the rank, and then scam someone, I use there money plus a little of mine to give the person their money back.

Read full topic

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Chassy13:

It still doesn’t make sense why they’d have to buy a spot. If you don’t want people with 2m hosting, have them show you the max amount of cash they have before making them a rank.

True, things will change for sure, I’m still VERY open for ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: New Dicing Community!

item.description:

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I don’t need the money, I have plenty. I just want this to be legit, and not have people with 2m trying to host(and most likely scam). Plus, the spots are more of an honor rank. Not all ranks will be purchased, if you earn the trust of me and the rest of the main community members, you may earn a rank.

Read full topic

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

If you want to start something that can grow make a site and don’t sell spots until its as big as the others. Otherwise this wont be going anywhere, my name allows me to host a pretty large dicing clan with about 50 rollers that I know and trust. I don’t charge a single dime for them to be active rollers. This just looks like an attempt for a quick buck.

Read full topic

item.title: New Dicing Community!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Check into this please guys, I’m really trying to start something that can grow. I know it’ll never be like dragon dyce, but I’d still like to have a large community.

Read full topic
